title: Bluegrass country
brief_description: A film of the annual Bluegrass Music Festival at Berryville, Virginia. Conveys the history of this indigenous American folk-music through the high-energy performances of the professional musicans and impromtu jam sessions of their fans. The performers discuss their music. No other credits available.
